entry.def: The conveyance of something is the process of carrying or transporting it from one place to another.

example.ex: ...the conveyance of bicycles on Regional Railways trains.
example.tran: 通过地区铁路公司的火车运输自行车

means.word_mean: 3. something that serves as a means of transportation
4. act of transferring property title from one person to another
5. the act of transporting something from one location to another
